thread.title: Penguin Random House Acquires Rodale Books

author: Jeffrey A. Trachtenberg
title: Penguin Random House Acquires Rodale Books

organizations.name: penguin random house acquires rodale books penguin random house

text:
Penguin Random House has acquired Rodale Books from Hearst, adding a stable of wellness and cooking titles to the world’s largest consumer book publisher, the companies announced Tuesday.
Rodale Books also focuses on such categories as health and gardening, and includes the children’s imprint Rodale Kids. The deal price wasn’t disclosed.
